main event: An observer in Lafayette, Indiana, saw an object that resembled a parachute descend and then shoot away at high speed.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 3-5 minutes,The object moved up and down before stopping overhead,The object shot away over 4 miles in just 10 seconds towards the northeast,The observer described it as metallic in color and faster than any jet they had seen,The sighting occurred in October 1955 under fair sky conditions.
